name: Antivaxxer
description:
Antivaxxer
This 2D arcade-like game is about sheep dodging syringes to have the biggest score. For getting a big score, you get a big reward in the form of coins, that you can spend in the shop for skins for your sheep. Can you have the biggest score out of your friends?
This game does not mean to promote any anti-vaccine movement, events, groups, or people. This game was made solely for humor purposes.
